abstract: The president of Goldman Sachs Group said on Thursday that there is “no indication” that the investment bank is close to settling U.S. fraud charges with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.
snippet: The president of Goldman Sachs Group said on Thursday that there is “no indication” that the investment bank is close to settling U.S. fraud charges with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The president of Goldman Sachs Group said on Thursday that there is “no indication” that the investment bank is close to settling fraud charges with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Goldman’s Cohn: No Indication of Settlement

abstract: Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase are expected to take the lead underwriting positions in an initial public offering of General Motors, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase are expected to take the lead underwriting positions in an initial public offering of General Motors, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase are expected to take the lead underwriting positions in an initial public offering of General Motors, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan to Lead on a G.M. I.P.O.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: In buying Infotel, a conglomerate owned by one of two feuding billionaire brothers seeks a bigger stake in the telecommunications industry.
snippet: In buying Infotel, a conglomerate owned by one of two feuding billionaire brothers seeks a bigger stake in the telecommunications industry.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI  India’s bitterest family feud got down to business on Friday.

headline.main: Reliance Industries to Buy Indian Broadband Company
headline.print_headline: Reliance Industries to Buy Indian Broadband Company
